name: pdf-mcp-server
description: Enhanced PDF MCP Server v2.0 with built-in advanced features including password support, OCR, enhanced table extraction, and image processing - ready to use out of the box

scripts.install-system-deps: echo 'Installing system dependencies...' && (command -v apt-get >/dev/null && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y poppler-utils tesseract-ocr) || (command -v brew >/dev/null && brew install poppler tesseract) || echo 'Please install poppler-utils and tesseract-ocr manually for your system'
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install-python-deps && npm run install-system-deps && npm run build
